DOC.brief_summary: The overarch goal project develop culturally congruent intervention increase level physical activity among sedentary Latinas ( i.e. , Latina/Hispanic woman ) . The first phase involve culturally linguistically modify exist evidenced-based intervention , found Transtheoretical Model Social Cognitive Theory , target sedentary Latinas . Then , conduct pilot randomize clinical trial test whether culturally-modified individually tailor intervention increase physical activity level comparison standard care comprise bilingual health education booklet .
DOC.brief_title: Seamos Activas : Increasing Physical Activity Among Latinas
DOC.detailed_description: While general United States population suffer epidemic sedentary lifestyle , Latinos even sedentary non-Hispanic white counterpart . Notably , Latinos suffer great rate morbidity mortality condition associate sedentary non-Hispanic white . One concern due cultural artifact , socioeconomic circumstance , language barrier , Latinos limit access public health intervention promote active lifestyle . The current study advance nursing science use theory-based computer-run expert system provide effective physical activity intervention underserved population . The consent form complete participant describes nature purpose study , procedure , risk benefit participate , alternative therapy available , confidentiality .
DOC.criteria: Sedentary ( i.e. , participate moderate vigorous physical activity two day per week le 30 minute less day ) woman age 18 65 selfidentify Latina ( group define Hispanic/Latino Census Bureau ) eligible participation Exclusion criterion history coronary heart disease ( history myocardial infarction symptom angina ) , diabetes , stroke , osteoarthritis , osteoporosis , orthopedic problem , serious medical condition would make physical activity unsafe . Other exclusion criterion include individual report consume three alcoholic drink per day , current planned pregnancy , plan move area within next six month , current suicidal ideation psychosis , current clinical depression , hospitalization due psychiatric disorder past 3 year , BMI 40 , and/or take medication may impair physical activity tolerance performance ( e.g. , beta blocker ) . Participants pilot study must also agree assign one two intervention condition .
